summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 4th Avenue South from Michigan Street to Fidalgo Street; and a certain other street, by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 18104 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
